duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet or exceed established district quotas for Retail Volume in loan and lease volumes.
Effectively manage the overall district through analysis of potential dealer and customer opportunities.
Develop actionable and measurable territory plans to achieve targeted goals.
Directly interact and collaborate with Volvo and Mack Truck field and support representatives to ensure support of the OEMs' efforts.
Support OEM's efforts on conquest and targeted customers by team selling and bundling of the truck sale with financial services.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Finance, Marketing, or closely related (Master’s degree a plus).
